attributes.action: Support the poor majority in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that the PM/Government to reconsider taxing the poorest majority of workers in the UK. The majority of people in the UK earn a lot less than the average wage figure. Many people outside of the larger southern cities are earning less than the £17,000 upper threshold for the tax increase. We ask that you reconsider...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
